duties_responsibilities.duty: Collaborate with architecture team and external customers on new product specifications.
Drive interface logic chip and memory architecture solutions.
Develop circuit designs for memory array, input buffer, output buffer, control logic, address decode, datapath, and internal test logic, power generators, PLL.
Coordinate and lead the layout process, including placement and routing optimization.
Drive innovation into future Memory generations within a dynamic work environment.

education_certification.credential: MS or greater in Engineering or Design Engineering
